title: Fail to build cmake with ICC on Quartz
body:
Summary
Fail to build cmake with ICC on Quartz

### Expected Result
build without error.

### Actual Result
Error message sample:
```
     1913    /tmp/wang102/spack-stage/spack-stage-ATzzS_/cmake-3.11.3/Source/kwsys/ProcessUNIX.c(2871): warning #266: function "sigprocmask"
              declared implicitly
     1914              sigprocmask(SIG_UNBLOCK, &unblockSet, 0);
     1915              ^
     1916
  >> 1917    /tmp/wang102/spack-stage/spack-stage-ATzzS_/cmake-3.11.3/Source/kwsys/ProcessUNIX.c(2871): error: identifier "SIG_UNBLOCK" is u
             ndefined
     1918              sigprocmask(SIG_UNBLOCK, &unblockSet, 0);
     1919                          ^
     1920
  >> 1921    /tmp/wang102/spack-stage/spack-stage-ATzzS_/cmake-3.11.3/Source/kwsys/ProcessUNIX.c(2883): error: incomplete type is not allowe
             d
     1922          struct sigaction newSigAction;
     1923                           ^
     1924
  >> 1925    /tmp/wang102/spack-stage/spack-stage-ATzzS_/cmake-3.11.3/Source/kwsys/ProcessUNIX.c(2884): error: expected an identifier
     1926          struct sigaction& oldSigAction;
     1927                          ^
     1928
     1929    [ 10%] Built target foo
  >> 1930    /tmp/wang102/spack-stage/spack-stage-ATzzS_/cmake-3.11.3/Source/kwsys/ProcessUNIX.c(2885): error: incomplete type is not allowe
             d
     1931          memset(&newSigAction, 0, sizeof(struct sigaction));
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```
spack install cmake %intel
```
### Information on your system
Intel 18.0.2
spack: * develop cea5d04 Fix GDAL Python bindings and add import tests (#8482)
Machine: quartz
